description: The counters consist of two small tube sensors stretching across the street, which are attached to a small metal counting box made by Eco-Counter. The tubes only count people riding bikes. They are very accurate and designed to be used on greenways and cycle tracks.

name: Broadway Cycle Track North Of E Union St
